carrotaws:elastic-compute-image-register

Full name:

com.carrotgarden.maven:carrot-maven-aws-plugin:1.1.0-SNAPSHOT:elastic-compute-image-register

Description:

register/create new ami image from existing ec2 instance

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: prepare-package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
computeServerId String - AWS ElasticCompute login credentials stored in settings.xml under server id entry; username="aws key id", password="aws secret key";
Default value is: com.example.aws.compute.
computeTimeout Long - AWS ElasticCompute operation timeout; seconds
Default value is: 600.
imageDescription String - ec2 ami image description
Default value is: amazon-image-description.
imageName String - AWS ElasticCompute ami image name; must be unique;
Default value is: amazon-image-name.
imagePropertiesInputFile File - AWS ElasticCompute image create input properties file; normally created by previous cloud formation invocation; must include InstanceId property;
Default value is: ./target/formation/formation.properties.
imagePropertyInstanceId String - name of the property in input properties file that will be used to discover InstanceId to use as basis for image create operation
Default value is: InstanceId.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
imageInstanceId String - AWS ElasticCompute instance id to use for image create; if provided explicitly in pom.xml, then it will override value form properties file; this value must come either from image properties file of from pom.xml properties

Parameter Details

computeServerId:

AWS ElasticCompute login credentials stored in settings.xml under server id entry; username="aws key id", password="aws secret key";
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: com.example.aws.compute

computeTimeout:

AWS ElasticCompute operation timeout; seconds
  • Type: java.lang.Long
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 600

imageDescription:

ec2 ami image description
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: amazon-image-description

imageInstanceId:

AWS ElasticCompute instance id to use for image create; if provided explicitly in pom.xml, then it will override value form properties file; this value must come either from image properties file of from pom.xml properties
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

imageName:

AWS ElasticCompute ami image name; must be unique;
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: amazon-image-name

imagePropertiesInputFile:

AWS ElasticCompute image create input properties file; normally created by previous cloud formation invocation; must include InstanceId property;
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ./target/formation/formation.properties

imagePropertyInstanceId:

name of the property in input properties file that will be used to discover InstanceId to use as basis for image create operation
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: InstanceId
